By Anonymous on Wednesday, March 20, 2002 - 10:53 am:

I noticed, Lisa, that you have deleted the table you built with your lifespan research, presumably because it turned out to be so random. I wanted you to know I've finished my own research using game saves and collected enough data to at least give some estimates. The research is in the MR1 Advanced forum on MR.com. You're welcome to do with it as you please, I would have posted it here but I'm sure you'd rather include it in your FAQ in your own way.

I will be collecting more data off and on so I can narrow down some of the remaining grey areas.

Richard Ryley - ryley@phan.org
